title: What is the concept of technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technology can be most broadly defined as the entities, both material and immaterial, created by the application of mental and physical effort in order to achieve some value. In this usage, technology refers to tools and machines that may be used to solve real-world problems. Technology is the set of knowledge, skills, experience and techniques through which humans change, transform and use our environment in order to create tools, machines, products and services that meet our needs and desires. Etymologically the word comes from the Greek tekne (technical, art, skill) and logos (knowledge). 7 types of technology construction technology.Manufacturing technology.Medical technology.energy power technology.transportation technology.Agriculture and bio technology.

It falls into at least four categories: Knicknacks, for example, bracket screw, toys.Tools, for.example, hammer, nails.Weapons, for example laser, bomb.Machines, for example clock, computer, perpetual motion.JF argues vehicles are ‘versatile’ technology thatu fit a number of different categories. Thanks to JF for attempting to formulate this first.
